Configuring Authentication

The authentication information is required to establish the user identity that provides access control permission for providers. There are two ways of authentication.

 • Local providers

 • Remote providers such as Radius, LDAP, and TACACs

Note • The user id must have a configured list of valid IDs for user authentication.

 • Password is encrypted when you push the configuration.

 

You can configure the following features:

 • Domain Authentication

 • Provider group
